system.descriptor: Hiding things, from small objects, to starships, to people, either somewhere or someplace. Requires appropriate environment to hide.
system.uses: Opposed Test vs Awareness/Scrutiny/Search to hide thing/person. +10 to test if the thing/person remains perfectly still
